channel.title: OldschoolPKZ RETURNS! The joy of training! and W+PKING IN THE WILD!
channel.description:
[center][size=18pt]JOIN MITIUS 317![/size][/center] Desktop Client!- [ftp=ftp://dl.dropbox.com/u/27152337/client.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/27152337/client.jar[/ftp] Webclient!- [ftp=ftp://militus.webs.com/]http://militus.webs.com/[/ftp] Forums!- [ftp=ftp://militus.webs.com/apps/forums/]http://militus.webs.com/apps/forums/[/ftp] [center][size=14pt][center]FEATURES![/center][/size] [size=12pt]
- 24-01-12 - I have adding almost instant switching via ConnectionHandler and Packet.java 25-01-12 - Midterms.. 26-01-12 - Perfect PvP Titles with Quest Tab Saving. PvP point system is complete! 27-01-12 - Made all shops created from scratch by me. 29-01-12 - Player updating is perfected! Tested with killstreak updating and players online updates with players logging in and out! 29-01-12 - Perfected PvP System so that it checks the ip, you cannot gain points using the same IP Adress 05-02-12 - 19-02-12 - -- Updated Client -- 474 data, with a 474 game frame. We wanted some items to be accessible in - game, but not all. Items such as godswords will not be in - game unless requested. -- Updated context menus; they look much cleaner and organized. -- Thanks to Aroused, we have finished Thieving. -- Thieving area is at Ardougne, which is a nice, non-edited area for thieving. You can access it by thieving, and you get money depending on the level. -- Perfect animations, correct timers. ------ Combat Update: Finished and perfected our PvP System Today! This is how it works: There are ranks that you show off, depending on how many kills you have. This rank is shown before your name to every player. Once you rank up, say at 25 kills, it will automatically update your rank, and it will tell you the new items you have unlocked. Items are unlocked from the PvP Store, not bought. Once you have the required amount of kills, you can obtain that item. PvP limits you from attacking the same IP. One small addition that I will make today is that you will not be allowed to trade or equip items that you do not have the required rank to equip! Combat has been perfected! Range max hit formula has been redone, and clipping is up and working. We have fixed up magic PvP, and melee has not been touched since it was already very good. PvP Point Glitch - dying against npcs but gaining point has been fixed. ------ Boss Update + Clipped Server Kalphite Queen -- added by Aroused 3 Forms Correct protection Correct Level Correct GFX's Correct Animations You can hit through protection with Verac's. Correct Changing Correct Poisoning - Will add pic. Sea Troll Queen -- added by z0mg beast Correct Animations Correct Level Correct GFX Correct Spell Casting Forced Chat Correct Hits - Will add pic. Aroused is about to finish adding clipped NPCS. Clipped following has been added Added Correct Projectiles when Ranging Aroused has added full barrows animations with correct stats. -- New friends and ignore list!
[/center][/size] [center]IMAGES![/center] [img]http://i962.photobucket.com/albums/ae101/jkatzjk96/Magic.png[/img] [img]http://i962.photobucket.com/albums/ae101/jkatzjk96/headicons.gif[/img] [img]http://i962.photobucket.com/albums/ae101/jkatzjk96/Range.png[/img] [img]http://i962.photobucket.com/albums/ae101/jkatzjk96/Bridding.gif[/img] [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/2ia97nt.png[/img]

item.title: OldschoolPKZ RETURNS! The joy of training! and W+PKING IN THE WILD!
item.dc:creator: @igotguts3 igotguts3
item.description:
@igotguts3 wrote:

[center][size=18pt]JOIN MITIUS 317![/size][/center]

Desktop Client!- [ftp=ftp://dl.dropbox.com/u/27152337/client.jar]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/27152337/client.jar[/ftp]

Webclient!- [ftp=ftp://militus.webs.com/]http://militus.webs.com/[/ftp]

Forums!- [ftp=ftp://militus.webs.com/apps/forums/]http://militus.webs.com/apps/forums/[/ftp]

[center][size=14pt][center]FEATURES![/center][/size]

[size=12pt]

-

24-01-12 - I have adding almost instant switching via ConnectionHandler and Packet.java
25-01-12 - Midterms…
26-01-12 - Perfect PvP Titles with Quest Tab Saving. PvP point system is complete!
27-01-12 - Made all shops created from scratch by me.
29-01-12 - Player updating is perfected! Tested with killstreak updating and players online updates with players logging in and out!
29-01-12 - Perfected PvP System so that it checks the ip, you cannot gain points using the same IP Adress
05-02-12 - 19-02-12 -
– Updated Client
– 474 data, with a 474 game frame. We wanted some items to be accessible in - game, but not all. Items such as godswords will not be in - game unless requested.

– Updated context menus; they look much cleaner and organized.

– Thanks to Aroused, we have finished Thieving.
– Thieving area is at Ardougne, which is a nice, non-edited area for thieving. You can access it by thieving, and you get money depending on the level.
– Perfect animations, correct timers.

Combat Update:

Finished and perfected our PvP System Today!

This is how it works:

There are ranks that you show off, depending on how many kills you have. This rank is shown before your name to every player. Once you rank up, say at 25 kills, it will automatically update your rank, and it will tell you the new items you have unlocked. Items are unlocked from the PvP Store, not bought. Once you have the required amount of kills, you can obtain that item. PvP limits you from attacking the same IP. One small addition that I will make today is that you will not be allowed to trade or equip items that you do not have the required rank to equip!

Combat has been perfected!

Range max hit formula has been redone, and clipping is up and working. We have fixed up magic PvP, and melee has not been touched since it was already very good.

PvP Point Glitch - dying against npcs but gaining point has been fixed.

Boss Update + Clipped Server

Kalphite Queen – added by Aroused

3 Forms
Correct protection
Correct Level
Correct GFX’s
Correct Animations
You can hit through protection with Verac’s.
Correct Changing
Correct Poisoning

  • Will add pic.

Sea Troll Queen – added by z0mg beast
Correct Animations
Correct Level
Correct GFX
Correct Spell Casting
Forced Chat
Correct Hits

  • Will add pic.

Aroused is about to finish adding clipped NPCS.
Clipped following has been added
Added Correct Projectiles when Ranging
Aroused has added full barrows animations with correct stats.

– New friends and ignore list!

[/center][/size]

[center]IMAGES![/center]

Read full topic
item.source: OldschoolPKZ RETURNS! The joy of training! and W+PKING IN THE WILD!
